com.igeekinc.firehose

Class FirehoseBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.igeekinc.firehose.FirehoseBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirehoseClient, FirehoseServer

    public abstract class FirehoseBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Firehose is a streaming RPC system. All RPC's are, at the network level, asynchronous. FirehoseBase contains common methods and constants for FirehoseClient and FirehoseServer
    Author:
    David L. Smith-Uchida

      • processInput

        protected void processInput(com.igeekinc.firehose.ReadProgress progress,
                FirehoseChannel serverChannel,
                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,CommandBlock<?>> sequenceToCommandBlockMap)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This will read information from the channel and advance through the header and payload. If called on a non-blocking channel, this will return immediately, even if progress was not made.
        Parameters:
        sequenceToCommandBlockMap -
        channelToRead -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readHeaderAndPayload

        protected void readHeaderAndPayload(com.igeekinc.firehose.ReadProgress progress,
                        FirehoseChannel remoteChannel,
                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,CommandBlock<?>> sequenceToCommandBlockMap)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This will read the header and payload from a channel. channelToRead must be in non-blocking mode or an IllegalBlockingModeException will be thrown. readHeaderAndPayload, however, will block waiting for input
        Parameters:
        sequenceToCommandBlockMap -
        channelToRead -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
